title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.2 - Designation of privacy compliance officer and location of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.2 - Designation of privacy compliance officer and location of records

State Regulations
(a) The Director of

Human Resources is hereby designated as the privacy compliance officer
responsible for ensuring the authority's compliance with the provisions of the

Personal Privacy Protection Law, and for coordinating the authority's response
to requests for records or amendment of records. (b) Records or information on requesting
records, can be obtained by writing to: Director of Human Resources, Battery

Park City Authority, One World Financial Center, New York, NY 10281, (212)
416-5300. (c) The privacy compliance
officer is responsible for: (1)
assisting a
data subject in identifying and requesting personal information, if
necessary; (2)
taking one of the
following actions upon locating the record sought: (i) making the record available for
inspection, in a printed form without codes or symbols, unless an accompanying
document explaining such codes or symbols is also provided; (ii)
permitting or providing or certifying
copies of the records; and
(iii)
denying access to the record in whole or in part and explaining in writing the
reasons therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9001.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
